q1: Italy has a new manager. Will they turn things around?
a1: Italy have a chance to improve.
a2: Improvement is the virtue. Even if you don't win a title, if you did this time better than the previous it's all that matters.
q3: Isn't chemistry also needed? Do you think they appointed the right manager this time?
a3: I think they chose the right manager
q4: Know your rights! When to fight the boss and when to grin and bear it
a4: Who is their current manager, again?
q5: the new manager of italy is Roberto Mancini
a5: If it's true, Mancini is the coach of Italy
